attributes.action: End the lockdown fiasco just  social distance
attributes.additional_details:
Because I feel like our privileges are being taken away along with our sense of humanity 
Plus it’s against this countries own common law
attributes.background:
End lockdown now as kills more people than Covid 19.
Also lawfully get bill,act’s policies passed ie via vote not just brought like the 
Covid bill 2020 stop government ruling by decree no suppressing of the people’s rights and freedoms

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
